This method plot bar chart

src.data.plots.plot_cluster_result(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, predictions: list, model, title: str)¶

This method plot clustering results

Parameters

  • data – trained DataFrame,

  • predictions – prediction results of model, :type list

  • model – fitted clustering model

  • title – title for plot

src.data.plots.plot_count_plot(label_name: str, data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, title: str)¶

This method returns count plot of the dataset

Parameters

  • label_name – name of the class, :type str

  • data – input dataFrame, :type DataFrame

  • title – title of plot

:return plt

src.data.plots.plot_dendogram(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame)¶

This method plots dendogram to decide number of clusters in dataset

Parameters

data – train dataset, :type DataFrame

:return dendogram

src.data.plots.plot_elbow(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, num_of_cluster_range: set)¶

This method provides elbow ploting result

Parameters

  • num_of_cluster_range – range of the clusters, :type set

  • data – input data frame, :type DataFrame,

:return plot
